summary: Programmed an arbitrage bot in Web3.py that runs 24/7 looking for profitable trades across AVAX assets. Created data pipelines for storage of arbitrage opportunities for future analytics.  Pipeline was done with an on-prem server config primarily using Docker images of custom websockets to Web3 Contract ABIs.  Trade execution contract was compiled & deployed via Remix.
tech: Web3, Python, R Shiny, Solidity, SQLite, Docker

summary: Contracting part time to build a web application infrasturcture for instructors and students to easily implement computerized adaptive testing.  Technologies include: R Shiny, AWS S3, AWS EC2, Shiny Modules.
tech: R Shiny, Auth0, Modules, AWS, EC2

summary: Contracting part time to build data pipelines and web applications for business/reporting effciency along with distilling Amazon Prime Video/Netflix data to effectively target new viewers of CNN content. Technologies include: R shiny, AWS S3, Snowflake, Comscore, Rmarkdown
tech: R Shiny, AWS, Comscore, RMarkdown, Snowflake

summary: Contracted part time to finish a project to enable a verbal exam score submissions for board certification of surgeons. Technologies include: R shiny, AWS S3
Contracted to scale and build shiny apps for massive data distillation for model building for enhanced cross sell of products in the McAfee portfolio.

summary: Led and coded project to build an operation effciency tool using machine learning to better predict customer value to fairly give promotions on equipment and delivery levels.

summary: Developed modules to select promotional events in order to update a database for the field data cleaning.
Built an R Shiny app integrating Qualtrics and Salesforce data for more effective reporting.
Developed an app to predict oil and determine the profit after taxes via interactive maps and widgets.
Established a data analytics function for the parent company of over 30 subsidiaries with Software as a Solution applications for various verticals in the Small/Medium Business space.
Led the development of a newly formed Market Research/Analytics Department within the Merchant Services Division for one of North America’s largest payment processors.

Worked with clients to determine strategies for product development innovation, product pricing and media campaigns using consumer decision behavior analysis.  As project lead, directed work on 8 projects generating over $500,000 in revenue, writing proposals, building interactive dashboards, and presentations of findings.
Responsibilities included pulling, cleaning, analyzing, and presenting secondary data findings for Fox and Fox Sports, Discover Student Loans, Sonos, and Fox Theatrical.

Worked as part of the Analytics Team onsite at Nestle’s North American Head Quarters.  Conducted multidimensional analysis across four categories, including frozen foods, beverage, ice cream, and confections.
